name: Maze Island
description:
[Introduction]

- In game you will be a viking man own your path seek power of knowledge , but nothing easy you had an accident and lost in trang island, it's been created to challenge anyone seek power of God .

- Your purpose : using anything you have to came back campfire and finish game so you'll have things you seeking .

[Controls]

- Very easy to play : just swipe to move .

[Devices]

- Support all Android devices

[Credits]

-  2D Artist / UI : VA

- 3D Model / Code / Audio : HaDo
